main.name: Charanda Mheanman
main.description: I'm not a great. But if I'm going to do some assignment. I will do that until it completely done.
main.bio: Internship in an automation team as a data engineer at Betagro Agro-Group Public Company Limited. By writing a P&ID, System architecture network, Document control for PIMs system and Powerapps. During the internship, I did and additional project, Ultra wide band and Warehouse project.

education.school: King Mongkut's University of Technology Thonburi

work.title: Sale Engineer
work.description: Introduced product to customers. Manage orders and coordinate with production. Responsible for coordinating problems and consulting. Created a summary report of orders and sales. Collected a customers data and find new customers and a data of steel price to presenting on Power BI.
